title: Alpha Client Bugsplat
body: When i open Alpha Client i get a bug splat and i have already tried to uninstall and install but that didn't work

replies.body: A bugsplat issue can certainly be caused by bad game files, but also from outdated drivers or even hardware problems.  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this bugsplat fixed up.  Since the updated client uses the legacy client files, make sure to use the steps in the [reinstall guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to make sure it's processed properly.  Hope that helps!
